Text:
no seeds a lot stuck at 83.3%

also it sucks their site registration is down.. I guess they don't know how ad-revenue works..
also stuck at 83.3. there are plenty seeds , but can't get at least 1. don't know where the problem .. :(

I've been following wush for years, but it looks like they're flaking out. No 27th torrent and they dropped this one yesterday.

Sterngeek.com has about same quality but only 64kbps mp3. I guess that's where we have to start going..

Sterngeek just steals his rips from the newsgroups and puts his name on it.

Guess what retard... I don't cover my website full of ADs.  It also doesn't take 400 steps and redirections just to download a show.  I also don't steal my recordings from others and take credit for them.

Feel free to call this retard if you'd like.  He's a thief.

THose having issues should update their torrent client.  Could be an issue with the magnet links because there are over 150 seeders finished at 100%.

I keep shows seeding the entire day so there shouldn't be an issue getting them.  I'd imagine it's TPB changing the torrents or something.

@wush/unemployed temp-maker

hey loser, be careful who you call a retard. You rip and edit a radio show, someone else rips from you, nothing less nothing more. You have a following cause nobody gives you competition and the only alternative is to pay for a sirius subscription..

Just cause I point out something relevant that is factual and you don't like it, doesn't make me retarded. Learn your place in society, you're a loser who has a internet following of mostly SSI slobs, cause you pirate content that nobody else bothers to, of a radio talk show..

Now be a good tool and fetch content..boy

Well think about what you just said...

If that's what I am then what does it make you when you are the one re-posting my content and taking credit for it so you can pretend to be like me?

You're aspiring to be a "loser who has an internet following".  So this is just hilarious that you're calling me pathetic when your entire life's goal is to make believe you're like me.

Not to mention you're a girly looking Canuck that resembles Lance Bass with zits all over your face.  You live with your parents with no job making money off of the advertisements you plaster all over your horribly designed website.  Even funnier is you call yourself a web designer.

The reason I miss shows sometimes is because I actually do have a job and a personal life.  Unlike you.  So congratulations on being able to steal shows from someone else more often than I can.  Difference is I don't ass rape my visitors with advertisements nor do I steal from other uploaders.

Stop posing as random users too.  Be a fucking man and admit that you're Sterngeek when you talk shit instead of being a pussy.

The only way you can get people to follow you is if you pretend to be them.  It's sad...really.

By the way,  I currently run a home business, own my own home, and make a great living.  On top of that I have this great internet following of GREAT people.  If these people are all losers then why are you so desperate to have them follow you instead of me by plastering plugs for your gay website on my torrents?

YOU WANT TO BE ME.  Realize it already... you're jealous of me just like every other Stern provider out there.  The sad part is I do this as a hobby and for fun... and don't really care as much as any of you do.

I do this to create a community of Stern fans to chat with and you do this because you're sitting at home all day with nothing to do and found a way that you can PRETEND to be a functioning member of society and provide something.

You're plastered in that computer chair picking your nose all day waiting for me to post shows so you can hijack the links and plaster your name on it and suck up the false praise you get from people who you tricked into thinking you recorded it yourself.

That's why you're here writing on my torrents to begin with because you're waiting to steal them from me and grovel away at how much better I am than you.

THAT'S YOUR LIFE.  Go look in the mirror, pop those zits, and start crying.  It's not going to get any better from here.

Peace & Love!
